subtopics.content: When biologist Mia accepted a research expedition to the Amazon, she expected to study rare plants, not fight for survival. After their boat capsized during a storm, Mia and her guide, Carlos, were left stranded in the dense rainforest. They encountered venomous creatures, raging rivers, and a hidden tribe that welcomed them with kindness. Along the way, Mia not only documented an undiscovered species of orchid but also found an inner strength she never knew she had..
